sentences.en: A survey of 57 hospitals by Newchurch, a consultancy, reveals striking improvements.
sentences.cn: 一家名为纽彻奇的咨询公司对57家医院所作的调查显示改善十分明显。

sentences.en: And business services ( banking, insurance, consultancy ) cluster round the honeypot.
sentences.cn: 商业服务 ( 银行 、 保险 、 咨询 ) 都围着这个聚宝盆.

sentences.en: Article 15 Certified public accountants may undertake accounting consultancy and accounting services.
sentences.cn: 第十五条注册会计师可以承办会计咨询、计服务业务.

sentences.en: Consultancy and advisory roles for internationalization , fund raising and IPO activities.
sentences.cn: 提供项目融资、企业国际化和海外上市等咨询顾问服务.

sentences.en: He is acting on a consultancy basis.
sentences.cn: 他是根据专家意见采取行动的。

sentences.en: He set up several adverting consultancy business in the UK.
sentences.cn: 他在英国建立了好几家广告咨询公司.

sentences.en: James, I should refuse that consultancy with Shapiro, if I were you.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯，如果我是你，我就会拒绝向夏皮罗咨询。

sentences.en: Our consultancy center serves the people of all trades and professions whole - heartedly.
sentences.cn: 本咨询中心竭诚为各行各业人士服务.

sentences.en: Project name: International Consultancy of Conceptual Planning of Qianhai Region.
sentences.cn: 项目名称: 前海地区概念规划国际咨询.

sentences.en: The company's clients also benefit from a range of consultancy services.
sentences.cn: 该公司的客户也受益于广泛的咨询服务.

sentences.en: The consultancy offers advice on ethical tax-shelters.
sentences.cn: 这家咨询公司教人如何合理避税。

sentences.en: The project provides both consultancy and training.
sentences.cn: 这个项目既提供咨询服务也提供培训。

sentences.en: We focus on the consultancy and study on international commercial investment.
sentences.cn: 我们专注于国际商业投资的咨询服务和研究.

sentences.en: We have sublet part of our office to a financial consultancy.
sentences.cn: 我们将我们办事处的一部分转租给一家财务咨询公司.

sentences.en: With extensive experience of importing, exporting and international trade consultancy.
sentences.cn: 具有丰富经验的进口, 出口和国际贸易顾问.

words.tran_cn: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

trans.tran_cn: 顾问工作，顾问职位，咨询公司
trans.tran_en: a company that gives advice on a particular subject
